title: A Wedding and a Proposal
description: **You must read books 1-3 in the series prior to reading this one. This one is 3.5 in The Four Seasons Series.**We all know that Fall proposed to Hannah on Christmas, but is the same fate in the cards for Summer and Tristan? Did Hannah get the wedding of her dreams, or did Fall once again mess up in the romance department? A Wedding and a Proposal gives us an up close and personal view on the Four Seasons and the new chapters they are about to embark on, told from Fall and Summerâ€™s POV.
author: Alora Kate
